ProjectTitle: Restoring Brain Metabolism Through Physical Activity in Type 2 Diabetes
InitialFeedbackHistory:
11/12/2024
Ethics/Personal data: Could you please clarify the relationship between your project and the one at U Hasselt? Is your study conducted in full collaboration with U Hasselt, or is it a subproject of their larger initiative? Additionally, will all experiments be carried out in Hasselt, with personal data (including pseudonymous data) being transferred to KU Leuven? If so, please complete a PRET application to register the processing of personal data at KU Leuven. For more information see https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/en/studpers/index or contact pret@kuleuven.be if you have further questions.
